page.title: 03PORTHCAWL-Employment
page.content: Being a popular tourist resort, inevitably a lot of people,living in the town,use this as their source of employment,working in catering,hotels and shops. There have large new housing developments all round the town in recent years and being so close to the industrial area of Port Talbot and Bridgend,the natural beauty of the area has attracted people with industrial backgrounds to settle in the town. Today it is fast becoming a dormitary town for the more successful workers in the prosperous industries and local government.This is probably the reason why in a traditionally Labour stronghold,at the last election,the Tory candidate was voted as the M.P.
